mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGIN_TOKEN (TOKEN, EMP_ID, LOGIN_STATE, DEADLINE, CREATE_DATE) VALUES ( #{loginToken.token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginToken.empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginToken.loginState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginToken.deadLine,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginToken.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT FUNCTION_ID as functionId,FUNCTION_NAME as functionName, PARENT_FUNCTION_ID as parentFunctionId,FUNCTION_LEVEL as functionLevel, FUNCTION_URL as functionUrl FROM FUNCTION_INFO start with FUNCTION_ID=( SELECT B.FUNCTION_ID FROM EMP_ROLE_REL A,ROLE_FUNCTION_REL B WHERE A.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND A.ROLE_ID=B.ROLE_ID) connect by prior FUNCTION_ID=PARENT_FUNCTION_ID order by FUNCTION_LEVEL
